import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; // reactstrap components import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, FormGroup, Form, Input, Container, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import ImageUploader from 'react-images-upload'; // core components import UserHeader from "components/Headers/UserHeader.js"; import EditHeader from "../../components/Headers/EditHeader"; import { edit } from "../../network/ApiAxios"; const RegisterUser = props => { let user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("admin")); // const [isDisabled,setIsDisabled] = useState(false) const [isTempAddIsPerAdd, setIsTempAddIsPerAdd] = useState(false) const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); //temp Add const [tempAddLine1, setTempAddLine1] = useState(""); const [tempAddLine2, setTempAddLine2] = useState(""); const [tempAddArea, setTempAddArea] = useState(""); const [tempAddCity, setTempAddCity] = useState(""); const [tempAddState, setTempAddState] = useState(""); const [tempAddPin, setTempAddPin] = useState(""); ///per Add const [perAddLine1, setPerAddLine1] = useState(""); const [perAddLine2, setPerAddLine2] = useState(""); const [perAddArea, setPerAddArea] = useState(""); const [perAddCity, setPerAddCity] = useState(""); const [perAddState, setPerAddState] = useState(""); const [perAddPin, setPerAddPin] = useState(""); const [photo, setPhoto] = useState(); const [signature, setSignature] = useState(); const [aadhar, setAadhar] = useState(); const [castCert, setCastCert] = useState(); const [dob, setDOB] = useState(new Date); const [mobile, setMobile] = useState(); const [fname, setFName] = useState(""); const [lname, setLName] = useState(""); const sameAddress = async (val) => { await setIsTempAddIsPerAdd(val); await setPerAddLine1(tempAddLine1) await setPerAddLine2(tempAddLine2) await setPerAddArea(tempAddArea) await setPerAddCity(tempAddCity) await setPerAddState(tempAddState) await setPerAddPin(tempAddPin) } const onDrop = (val, pictureFiles, pictureDataURLs) => { switch (val) { case 'photo': break; default: break; } } const RegUser = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } return ( <> {/* Page content */}

Register New User.
User information
setFName(e.target.value)} type="text" /> setLName(e.target.value)} type="text" /> setEmail(e.target.value)} type="email" /> setPassword(e.target.value)} type="Text" /> setDOB(e.target.value)} type="date" /> setMobile(e.target.value)} type="number" /> {/* Address */}
Temporary Address
setTempAddLine1(e.target.value)} type="Text" /> setTempAddLine2(e.target.value)} type="Text" /> setTempAddArea(e.target.value)} type="Text" /> setTempAddCity(e.target.value)} type="Text" /> setTempAddState(e.target.value)} type="Text" /> setTempAddPin(e.target.value)} type="Text" />
Same As Temporary Address ?
sameAddress(e.target.checked)} type="CheckBox" />
Permanent Address
setPerAddLine1(e.target.value)} type="Text" /> setPerAddLine2(e.target.value)} type="Text" /> setPerAddArea(e.target.value)} disabled={isTempAddIsPerAdd} type="Text" /> setPerAddCity(e.target.value)} type="Text" /> setPerAddState(e.target.value)} type="Text" /> setPerAddPin(e.target.value)} type="Text" />
Upload Documents
Uplaod Photo
{ onDrop('photo') }} singleImage={true} imgExtension={['.jpg', '.gif', '.png', '.gif', '.jpeg']} maxFileSize={412000} withPreview={true} />
Uplaod Signature
{ onDrop('signature') }} singleImage={true} imgExtension={['.jpg', '.gif', '.png', '.gif', '.jpeg']} maxFileSize={412000} withPreview={true} />
Uplaod Aadhar
{ onDrop('aadhar') }} singleImage={true} imgExtension={['.jpg', '.gif', '.png', '.gif', '.jpeg']} maxFileSize={412000} withPreview={true} />
Uplaod Cast Certificate
{ onDrop('castCert') }} singleImage={true} imgExtension={['.jpg', '.gif', '.png', '.gif', '.jpeg']} maxFileSize={412000} withPreview={true} />
) } export default RegisterUser
